attributes.action: Make Volkswagen comply to EU targets for greener cars
attributes.additional_details:
Volkswagen is spending millions of Euros every year on lobby groups against European standards for greenhouse gas reductions, which has therefore earn't the company some bad recognition.
Volkswagen says it wants to be “the most eco-friendly automaker in the world” and fortunately has the technology to make their cars greener but isn't willing to do so and comply to the EU targets which is disgraceful! So, sign this petition to make it compulsory for Volkswagen to support the EU targets!
